name: Da Nang food experience
description: We were born in Hoi An ancient town and raised in Da Nang beach city, so we really love Da Nang & Hoi An food. With this passion, we would like to share our experience to all tourists and travellers who want to set their legs on our beloved cities. Have your ever heard about Phở, Quảng noodles, Bánh mì, Bánh xèo(Vietnamese pancake), chicken rice with special recipe, etc?
